summary: Following the death of her father, a young girl visits her estranged family at their sinister castle in the countryside, and comes to realize her eccentric and morbid relatives are not quite alive.
cast: Christina von Blanc|Carmen Yazalde|Anne Libert|Rosa Palomar|Howard Vernon|Jesús Franco|Paul Muller|Alice Arno|Wal Davis|Antônio do Cabo|Nicole Guettard|Linda Hastreiter|Rose Kiekens|France Nicolas|Pierre Taylou
director: Directors: Jesús Franco (as Jess Franco), Pierre Quérut (uncredited) | 1 more credit »
title: Los sueños eróticos de Christina
